name: ai-portfolio-agent
description: AI Portfolio Agent - Angular Portfolio with Admin CMS + Backend API

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd ng-portfolio && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:frontend: cd ng-portfolio && npm ci || npm install
scripts.install-deps: cd ng-portfolio && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
